message: Found key fields in Agent interface that can identify reviewer agents: agent_type field (lines 6-7 in types/index.ts) - reviewer agents likely have agent_type starting with 'reviewer-', and phase_index field (line 19) which could be -1 for reviewers

CONFIRMED: Reviewer agents can be distinguished by phase_index=-1 (real_mcp_server.py:4972) and agent_type starting with 'reviewer-' (real_mcp_server.py:4963). Frontend can use these fields to visually distinguish reviewers from regular phase work agents.

Visual distinction recommendations for reviewer agents: 1) Different background color (purple/indigo theme), 2) 'Reviewer' badge next to agent type, 3) Gavel/scales icon, 4) Show in separate 'Review Panel' section when UNDER_REVIEW phase, 5) Group reviewers together at top/bottom of agent list
